name: Rescind
description:
Live with the consequences of your actions.  Choose kindness; or don't. It's all up to you baby so try not to regretti spaghetti.

{ } * { } * { } * { }

Be a god with daydreams of immortality. Consume a wanderer. Flood a village of heretics. Grow infinitely large.

{ } * { } * { } * { } 

Honestly made because I fucked up and was angry with myself (apparently when I need to cope I make GAMES). This isn't a "wow I'm stoked and going to push the boundaries of the form" sort of game, this is a "wow i can't believe I fucked that up so bad" sort of game. 

That said. The best part about this game is the soundtrack. 

{ } 

Made for I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story Jam
